ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:17}); // {Cloud}
“By the way, I haven't introduced
myself yet.”{PAUSE}“I'm {Cloud}, a jack of all trades.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:27}); // {Cloud}
“I have a favor to ask of you.
Can you put makeup on me, too?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:18}); // “Oh, yeah…?
Welcome, {Cloud}.”{PAUSE}“(Gross! Don't get carried away,
remember your name is 'Pooch!')”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // “Shake, shake, shake…”{PAUSE}“(You think he's after me? Really?
This guy makes me sick…
And his eyes are weird, too…)”{PAUSE}“(Yeah, don't hurt these guys' feelings.
Let's at least say 'hi' to him.)”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // “Mix, mix, mix……”{PAUSE}“(What should I do?
Is he following me? Really?
What if he follows me home?)”{PAUSE}“(Poochy'll do it, I'm sure of it…)”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // “Pita, pita, pita…”{PAUSE}“(God, what a pest!
All right, get out of here!
You dog…)”{PAUSE}“(That's it, I'll name him 'pooch'.)”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // “Fluff, fluff, fluff…”{PAUSE}“(Hmm!
I guess he doesn't realize his position.
I feel sorry for him.
Just ignore him, just ignore him.)”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // “Paste, paste, paste…”{PAUSE}“(Oh God…here's another one of those guys.
You know, the delicate type.
Just ignore him, just ignore him.)”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // “Hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm…
Hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm…
Hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm…”{PAUSE}“Phew……
…it's so tiring.”

dialogStrings: Honey Bee Inn

“Hmm, hmm, hmm…”{PAUSE}“Ohhh, I just can't seem to lose weight.
Hmm, hmm, hmm…”

“Sir!!
You can't come in here.”{PAUSE}“(Yuk…a pervert…)”

“Oh my!!
(…You're still here?
Oh well, good timing anyway.)”{PAUSE}“Hey, what do you think about me?”
{CHOICE}Not interested
{CHOICE}Whatever…

“(Of course…)
Oh, I'm so happy.
In what way?”
{CHOICE}Not interested
{CHOICE}Whatever…

“NO WAY!
I'M SO SHOCKED!!”

“Oh my!! Are you embarrassed?
(Man!! Why are you so moody?)”

“Hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm…
Hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm…
Hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm…”{PAUSE}“Phew……
…it's so tiring.”

“Oh!!”{PAUSE}“Is something the matter?”
{CHOICE}Not yet
{CHOICE}Not really

“Hmph!! Listen you, not that you care,
but you sure know
how to make people mad.”

“Paste, paste, paste…”{PAUSE}“(Oh God…here's another one of those guys.
You know, the delicate type.
Just ignore him, just ignore him.)”

“Fluff, fluff, fluff…”{PAUSE}“(Hmm!
I guess he doesn't realize his position.
I feel sorry for him.
Just ignore him, just ignore him.)”

“Pita, pita, pita…”{PAUSE}“(God, what a pest!
All right, get out of here!
You dog…)”{PAUSE}“(That's it, I'll name him 'pooch'.)”

“Mix, mix, mix……”{PAUSE}“(What should I do?
Is he following me? Really?
What if he follows me home?)”{PAUSE}“(Poochy'll do it, I'm sure of it…)”

“Shake, shake, shake…”{PAUSE}“(You think he's after me? Really?
This guy makes me sick…
And his eyes are weird, too…)”{PAUSE}“(Yeah, don't hurt these guys' feelings.
Let's at least say 'hi' to him.)”

“Uhh…
Hel…Hello.”{PAUSE}“What a nice day, today.”
{CHOICE}Introduce yourself
{CHOICE}Say Goodbye

{Cloud}
“By the way, I haven't introduced
myself yet.”{PAUSE}“I'm {Cloud}, a jack of all trades.”

“Oh, yeah…?
Welcome, {Cloud}.”{PAUSE}“(Gross! Don't get carried away,
remember your name is 'Pooch!')”

“BYE!!
(Phew…I'm safe now…)”
“Take care…{Cloud}.”

“Uh….
Do you put makeup on?”
“Eyaaah!”{PAUSE}“Don't watch!!”
“Eyaaah!”{PAUSE}“Don't!”
“…Oh my…”

{Cloud}
“If I were to dress up like a woman…
Then I've got to really prepare carefully.”{PAUSE}“I should be able to put makeup on here.”
{CHOICE}Have them make me up
{CHOICE}Don't do it

{Cloud}
“I have a favor to ask of you.
Can you put makeup on me, too?”
“…Paste, paste, paste…”{PAUSE}“Oh…my…”
